# API TERMINAL PULOGEBANG


[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)](https://api.terminalpulogebang.com)

# Features!

  - /boarding [GET/POST/PUT/DEL]
  - /authentication [GET/POST]
  - /po [GET]
  - /tujuan [GET]

**OUTPUT SUPPORT:**
add Parameter ``format: output``
  - json
  - xml
  - csv (download)
  - html
  - pdf (download)

```sh
to get a username and password please contact Terminal Terpadu Pulogebang
```
